subject: Re: [junit] Basic Question - How to stimulate a mouse click in junit?
msgSnippet: ... I assume you mean simulate . Are you working with a Swing application or a web application? For Swing applications, look for the package Jemmy. For web
messageBody:
cute4gerbil wrote:

> Hi i am new on this topic
>
> hmm..
>
> how to stimulate right and left click?

I assume you mean "simulate".

Are you working with a Swing application or a web application?

For Swing applications, look for the package Jemmy. For web
applications, look for HtmlUnit.

Good luck.
